chapters.title: The Big Send-off
chapters.content: The day had finally come. This was their voyage of a lifetime and they were more than ready to start. All of the family said their tearful goodbyes as they walked toward the spaceship. The kid holding their parents' hands tightly, not wanting to let go of the only home they knew.
chapters.illustration: A family walking with a spaceship in the background.

chapters.title: Adjusting to Life Abroad
chapters.content: Once aboard the large vessel, the kid left their parents and explored the ship. They were amazed at all of the amazing technology aboard—robots, intelligent AI, and 3D food printers. It didn't take them long to make friends with the other passengers, some of them which had very interesting backgrounds.
chapters.illustration: A group of aliens gathering around to learn about the youth.

chapters.title: Slumber in Space
chapters.content: The journey had it's highs and lows at times, but as they neared their destination the kid felt a sense of pleasant anticipation. After they had been briefed on the upcoming descent, they retired to their cabin to get a good night's sleep. It would be the longest period of darkness they would ever experience.
chapters.illustration: A child in their bed, excited for the days to come, drifting off.

chapters.title: The Great Awakening
chapters.content: The kid awoke with the most incredible feeling in their chest—a feeling of peace and contentment. Through the windows, bright lights and city buildings could be seen—the kid knew it, they had arrived. They threw on their outdoor garments, consumed a hearty breakfast and began their grand exploration.
chapters.illustration: The kid, adorned in a humorous astronaut outfit, marveling at a gleaming city.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
"""

messages.name: Assy
